title: XI Extreme Love
sinopse: This manga contains a series of one-shots that feature Hanai Shishimaru, the perverted boss of ‘The Help-for-Help-Seekers Room’, which will do anything for their clients except murder. Causing divorces, turning someone gay, ‘relieving stress’ on a crowded train…… Just how far will he go? (Source: B-U Manga)
